snippet.title: Draconic Date Remastered Trailer
snippet.description:
By invoking the old Dragon Law, you managed to get your dragon girlfriend out for a date. What will you discover in that old abandoned castle, and what bounds will you forge with Iryl?

Wishlist the game now on Steam!

Available November 29, 2024
